Name: Slow Comfortable Screw
Ingredients: 45 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice wheel.
FLOAT sloe gin on surface. (It will bleed into cocktail.)
Review: With freshly squeezed juice, this is a sight tastier than its reputation might suggest. Long and refreshing. Spiked fresh orange juice with Southern Comfort and hints of sloe berry fruit.
History: Origins and evolution of the "Slow Screw" family of cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of Slow Comfortable Screw contains 232 calories
